title: syndra animation bug patch 6.5
body:
After the 6.5 patch all of syndra's skins have a bugged movement animation, recall and death animation. When moving without boots she will glide instead and when tier 2 boots are purchased she will either move as she does in her atlantean skin or it will look like she is running (which would normally happen at +430 movespeed). Her recall animation looks like it 'broken' as when the recall begins she hesitates and then proceeds to recall. He death animation her left arm dislocates. Videos of these are below and they happen in every game. 

Glide movement bug - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vu8hWc8Dy80
Tier 2 boots movement bug - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gf11RtK84U0
Recall bug - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oleFaJ_gVhA

replies.body:
Hey I am Syndra (why am I not surprised you're the one reporting this? :P)

Thanks for the great bug report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating! We believe we know what's causing this issue.

haha syndra main confirmed? =P
and awesome cheers
hi just wondering when this will be fixed on the oce server cause the bug is still there.
Sorry for the wicked long wait/update. We're looking to (finally) have this solved for next patch!
Would this happen to include her death animation breaking her model, or are they separate issues? Curious if they're interrelated or not.
It includes both! They were both related due to a re-export of some animations. :)

Hello,

I'm uncertain what the bug fix in the 6.15 Patch actually did? Was it specific for OCE?

Her jittery walking is still there, her death model's right arm remains broken and jutting out of her chest, and she still desyncs when firing her ultimate.

Raw Videos:

One specifically for walking: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y8HCc33Gptk

One on overall gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7lKt4xkfQLE

The third ultimate in the second video is where the desync jitter occurs, though it is brief. I'll have more thorough evidence after more testing, as this is indicative to me the problem is still there.

Or, am I testing for the wrong bugs?

Gah, sorry. May be some miscommunication here. The fixed issue would be her recall windup and winddown. They're all related in terms of how they're broken, but require different fixes. The other issues are on the list of things to be resolved.

To be clear, the fix for the recall was 6.16.

Ah, ok. I wasn't certain, even the patch notes were vague. I shall temper my gleeful expectation for the next patches.

Thank you.

Okie. 

Let's get on the same page for all of this.

- Recall has been fixed.
- I poked our tech artist about the death animation, and this should be resolved next patch. :)
- I'm no longer seeing a jitter.
- Run animations looked to be fixed in 6.7, based on the bug logged when the issue was originally brought up.

Please feel free to correct me. :)

Undocumented patch changes drive me nuts ~_~

Ok, from what I've analyzed, Syndra's walk jitter and ultimate desync as I understand them are 'fixed'. There is still the issue of every 1-in-10 games getting 'stuck' to terrain, but that is purely a visual bug. Re-issuing a movement command 'snaps' her into place where she actually exists on the server.

Notably, some people are reporting me they are experiencing walk jitter/ult desync, but they haven't submitted video evidence for me to verify. I'll keep prodding other Syndra players on the matter to see what they see.

What jitter I did see is sufficiently difficult to distinguish from normal movement wackyness, usually around minions or near terrain walls (where most everyone can freak out for a split second in pathing logic). If Syndra's original jitter/desync is still there, it's rare enough now I've trouble spotting it.

We've been working more closely with our patch notes bros to update stuff we're fixing, especially on skins. ^-^ You've probably noticed a lot more skins fixes lately! 

> If Syndra's original jitter/desync is still there, it's rare enough now I've trouble spotting it.

If you do spot it, feel free to hit me up!  I'll dig into the ult desync a bit more in the meantime. :)

>  There is still the issue of every 1-in-10 games getting 'stuck' to terrain, but that is purely a visual bug. Re-issuing a movement command 'snaps' her into place where she actually exists on the server.

This may be a larger issue, but I can poke around and ask.

Hi there, Syndra's walking desync bug (where she frame skips beside herself, or paths around a small, invisible minion-like object randomly) has resurfaced again. It's been pretty bad this week and the last week, so I guess something in the back end must have been altered again.

It's to the point you should experience it in a normal game with her consistently, but I can dig out video footage if you like.

The terrain stickyness is, to my memory, unique to her, as I don't run into it on other champions. It's possible I've parsed it out of memory, but I've never gone 'ah I got stuck like Syndra does on that corner/tower/etc!'. It's not easily reproduced and happens seemingly anywhere at random, so testing for it is a nightmare.

I'll let you know if I run into anything more concrete.

Thank you for your time~

The run animation I think you're referencing is the one where she got stuck in her 'gliding' animation when she's super speed mode, which was definitely fixed. 

Off the top of my head, walk jittering is still a thing (in normal movement and how Syndra gets 'stuck' to terrain while walking). Her model desyncing after firing her ultimate is still a thing, too.

I'll dig through my stream recordings and see what I can reference in the 6.16 patch.
Unfortunately, I don't have an ETA for you. This is a smaller issue, as compared to others, but we do have it on the list of issues to resolve. When the issue is resolved, it will be on all servers.
